docs.title: Welcome to NDI-python
docs.text: This is the documentation for the Python port of the VH-Lab/NDI-matlab project.

docs.title: Project Overview
docs.text: NDI-python is a Python library for interacting with the Neuroscience Data Interface (NDI). It provides a set of tools for managing and analyzing neuroscience data.

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
To install the package, you can use pip:

pip install .

docs.title: ndi.cache
docs.text: The ndi.cache module provides a simple in-memory cache for storing data.

docs.title: The Cache class
docs.text: The Cache class is used to create a new cache object.

docs.title: __init__(self, maxMemory=10e9, replacement_rule='fifo')
docs.text:
Creates a new cache object.

  • maxMemory: The maximum amount of memory (in bytes) that the cache can use.
  • replacement_rule: The replacement rule to use when the cache is full. Can be 'fifo', 'lifo', or 'error'.

docs.title: add(self, key, type, data, priority=0)
docs.text:
Adds an item to the cache.

  • key: The key for the item.
  • type: The type of the item.
  • data: The data to be cached.
  • priority: The priority of the item (higher priority items are less likely to be evicted).

docs.title: lookup(self, key, type)
docs.text:
Looks up an item in the cache.

  • key: The key for the item.
  • type: The type of the item.

Returns the cached item, or None if the item is not found.

docs.title: File
docs.text: This package contains classes for file I/O.

docs.title: Navigator
docs.text:
ndi.file.Navigator(session, fileparameters=None, epochprobemap_class=None, epochprobemap_fileparameters=None)

An object for accessing files on disk.

docs.title: name_to_variable_name
docs.text:
ndi.fun.name_to_variable_name.name_to_variable_name(name)

Converts a string into a camelCase variable name format.

docs.title: channel_name_to_prefix_number
docs.text:
ndi.fun.channel_name_to_prefix_number.channel_name_to_prefix_number(channel_name)

Identifies the prefix and number from a channel name string.
